summary: This is an email chain from July 10, 2019, forwarding Jeffrey Epstein's arrest paperwork from the date of his arrest. The sender, an NYPD detective, indicates they are waiting for an additional document where Epstein declares his cell phone number.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded arrest paperwork. The document is his arrest paperwork from the date of his arrest.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's Arrest
events.description: The document forwards the arrest paperwork from the date of Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding Jeffrey Epstein's arrest paperwork.
The correspondence is dated July 10, 2019, shortly after Epstein's arrest.
The sender is an NYPD detective from the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force, indicating law enforcement coordination.
The sender mentions waiting for an additional document where Epstein declares his cell phone number.
The email chain involves the NYPD and FBI (Squad C20), showing inter-agency communication.
